summary: All DragonPriest's masks retextured and 15 new craftable masks !
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/4707-1-1329526052.jpg [/img]

[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[b] [color=#4ea2e5] Psychosteve's DragonPriest Masks [/color][/b] [b] | V 3.3 [/b]
[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


[b] [color=#e0530d]AT LAST!!!!! Here is the 3.3 version of the Dragonpriest Masks' mod !

Thanks to everyone for your support...and most important, for your patience![/color] [/b]

[b] [color=#fbaf37] See the change Log for more details about the update. [/color] [/b]


I've put a lot of hard work and love in this mod so far and i wanted to thank all players for their

comments and critics on the previous versions. This version is the next big step...

I wanted a more complete mod for [color=#ffe292]YOU ALL[/color] to enjoy. I hope you'll like it !


I've changed all the texture's path in every meshe files (Dragonborn masks included)...

so this version shouldn't have any issue with the [color=#ffe292]Bethesda HD texture pack's bug[/color] or any

other mod using the original masks.

This version is compatible with the [color=#ffe292]Nexus Mod Manager[/color] installer.



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Upcoming updates [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


[color=#fbaf37] I will update this mod ASAP : [/color]

[list]
[*] Miraak's mask (Dragonborn DLC)

[*] 6 new masks (total of 21 : 7 heavy - 7 light - 7 for mages)

[*] New masks for Argonians (male & female)...if i can

[*] New masks for Khajiits (male & female)...if i can
[/list]

[color=#fbaf37]...stay tuned ! [/color]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] WARNINGS :[/color] [/b]
[list]
[*] for those who have issues with crafting (not be able to craft the masks) use the BSA version

of the mod


[*] I'm using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654 target="_blank"] Realistic Lighting With Customization [/url] mod + my own custom config

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url] (screenshots are darker and less saturated)

[*] There are few small clipping issues for some hoods equiped with some armors / outfits.

I took the original meshes and add the masks on them...the clippings were already on the original
game's meshes !

[*] the new masks are not made for Argonians and Khajiit for now...i will fix it soon

(but you can use the "classic" masks who are compatible for all races / genders)

[*] All my new masks are not enchanted. I don't wanted to give overpowerd magic items but

i wanted to give you the possibility to make your own magical masks... so feel free to enchant
them as you like and to rename them !

[*] Some changes have been made with the CK (v3.2.2). All masks labeled as [ orc ] are not in
the crafting / temper list anymore...sorry if you have to craft those again but it was the only way
to optimize the mod. Now there is only two 3D objects per mask (new mask + classic version) in
the crafting menu for a lighter list... but don't worry all races (exept Beast races for now) are
wearing the right masks for their own race / gender.
[/list]



My mod (v2.1) on [color=#ffe292]Skyrim Mods weekly[/color] :

[youtube]_D-Z231KFuc[/youtube]


Enjoy !!



[b] [color=#fbaf37] What's in the box ?? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] new ESP / BSA files

[*] 1024 x 1024 textures

[*] 10 original retextured masks

[*] 10 original retextured hoods

[*] 15 new craftable masks (Daedric perk needed)

[*] 15 new hoods

[*] 3 retextured Dragonborn masks (Acolytes)

[*] 3 retextured Dragonborn hoods (Acolytes)

[*] unique normal map for each mask

[*] unique hood for each mask

[*] enchanting masks enabled

[*] humans / elves / orcs only compatible (for now)

[*] clipping fixed (unfortunatly not for all clothes / armors...stll working on it)

[*] 15 craftable "classic" masks for all races/ genders
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Install [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] [b] [color=#fbaf37]Uninstall any previous version of this mod before ![/color] [/b]

[*] Download the version of your choice : [color=#ffe292]Vanilla[/color] (without Dragonborn DLC) OR [color=#ffe292]Dragonborn[/color]
(only for those who have the DLC)

[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url] and follow the steps

[*] Choose your pack between [b] [color=#fbaf37]Basic[/color] [/b] (only basic textures) OR [b] [color=#fbaf37]Ultra[/color] [/b] (basic textures + craftable masks)

[*] [b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b] Manually extract the files into your [color=#ffe292]Skyrim/Data/[/color] folder

[*] Start the [color=#ffe292]Skyrim launcher[/color] and go to your mod list

[*] check [color=#ffe292]DragonPriestmasks[/color] if not already done
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37]IMPORTANT :[/color] For those who still want to use the 2.1 version (outdated but still working)[/b]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]Now you can use the v3.3 ("Vanilla" or "Dragonborn") with "basic" option to install only the
textures like the v2.1 (but only in ESP / BSA files...no more loose files), just follow the install
steps above[/color][/b]




[b] [color=#fbaf37] Uninstall [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Just uninstall the mod with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually delete the [color=#ffe292] dragonpriestmasks [/color] ESP and BSA files from your [color=#ffe292] Skyrim/Data/ [/color] folder

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR... if still using v2.1[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually delete all content from your [color=#ffe292] Skyrim/Data/meshes/armor/dragonpriesthelms [/color] and
[color=#ffe292] Skyrim/Data/textures/armor/dragonpriesthelm [/color] folders
[/list]


[b][color=#fbaf37]Credits[/color][/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Thanks to :
[list]
[*] [color=#ffe292]Jonathan Stonecipher[/color] for the original idea and designs : [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=277 target="_blank"] Alternate Dragon Priest Masks[/url]


[*] [color=#ffe292]Sparafucile[/color] for his help and tips with the NIF files (CK and Nifskope)

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1307602 target="_blank"] ClericMagnus [/url] for some mask's names (dragon words)
[/list]


[b] [color=#fbaf37] Want more ? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Don't forget to check out, like, endorse my other mods :

[list]
[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6538 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Golden God's Shrines [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4640 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Stone of Barenziah [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5763 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Bust of the Gray Fox [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11010 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's SkyUI icon Set [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7699 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Horse Whistle sound [/url]
[/list]

files.name: Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks 3_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Adds 10 new craftable masks
Dragon Priest bug fixed (now they will wear the vanilla masks with the new textures)

files.name: Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks 3_2
files.changelogHtml:
Adds 5 new craftable masks (total of 15)
Adds 15 \"classic\" masks for all races and genders
Meshes clipping fixed
Dragon Priest\'s mask altar bug fixed (putting a mask on the altar will show the good texture)

files.name: Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks 3_2 - BSA
files.changelogHtml:
Adds 5 new craftable masks (total of 15)
Adds 15 \"classic\" masks for all races and genders
Meshes clipping fixed
Dragon Priest\'s mask altar bug fixed (putting a mask on the altar will show the good texture)

files.name: Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks 3_2_2 - BSA
files.changelogHtml:
CK code optimisation (all orc useless forms removed)
Smithing list fixed (only 2 craftable items per mask for every available race)
Vokul recipe / temper fixed (requires firesalts instead of torche)
3D loading texture fixed (Krosis\'s texture is no more inverted)
All the craftable masks are ready to be used on Dragonpriest for future quests / mods

files.name: Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks 3_3 VANILLA - NMM
files.changelogHtml:
3 Dragonborn DLC masks are done ("vanilla" or "dragonborn" version to download)
new NMM installer : 2 packs to choose (Basic : only textures / Ultra : textures + craftable masks)
gloss effect on some metal type masks
changed the dragonpriest's assets for them to wear the modified masks properly
No more Oblivion symbol on Raghot ;)
